sentences.chinese: 然而，我们必须小心谨慎。

sentences.english: One must be very careful when comparing ORAC scores.
sentences.chinese: 在进行ORAC数据对比时，我们应该小心谨慎。

sentences.english: Another prejudice is the belief that policy should move cautiously.
sentences.chinese: 另一个偏见就是认为制定政策应该小心谨慎。

sentences.english: It's strange how chary we are about praising.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的是我们对待赞美非常小心谨慎。

sentences.english: On this matter, he is careful and fair-minded.
sentences.chinese: 在这件事上，他小心谨慎，公平持正。

sentences.english: He was a good and a careful driver.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个小心谨慎的好驭手。

sentences.english: They see you as very cautious, extremely careful, a slow and steady plodder.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为你非常小心谨慎，节奏缓慢但一贯辛勤。

sentences.english: Sadr's political comeback was the result of careful and deliberate planning.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克的政治复出是经过小心谨慎规划的结果。

sentences.english: Don't be cagey or vague in headlines.
sentences.chinese: 不要在标题上小心谨慎和含糊不清。

sentences.english: He warned them to be careful and have a safe journey.
sentences.chinese: 他警告两位新鹿王小心谨慎，以保旅程安全。

sentences.english: She is chary of lending money.
sentences.chinese: 她对借出金钱很小心谨慎。

sentences.english: When night cometh, then take I good care not to summon sleep.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚到临，我要小心谨慎不去召唤睡眠。

sentences.english: It was careful to structure WaMu's sale so that it avoids a hit to the fund.
sentences.chinese: 华惠的出售要小心谨慎，以防止对这笔资金产生冲击。

sentences.english: Unlike Utopia, Liu speaks in measured tones.
sentences.chinese: 和乌有之乡不同，刘讲起话来小心谨慎。

sentences.english: The girl is chary of strangers.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩对陌生人小心谨慎的。

sentences.english: We rely upon you to be careful in test-flying a plane .
sentences.chinese: 我们相信你们在试飞飞机时是小心谨慎的。

definition: to guard against/to be vigilant/watch you don't (slip)/also pr. [ti2 fang2]
cautious and solemn (idiom); very carefully/prudent/gently and cautiously
treat sth lightly/to lower one's guard
to be careful/to pay attention to
lit. as if walking on thin ice (idiom)/fig. to be extremely cautious/to be skating on thin ice
(saying) to be very scared and on edge
to be on the alert/vigilant/alert/on guard/to warn
